options.name: The Eternal Hunt
options.description: The Gnollish culture is built upon the concept of the great, unending hunt. Gain +1 Wilderness and +1 Resilience

options.name: Never Complacent
options.description: Gnolls are trained to keep tabs on their surroundings, as well as sleep lightly. You always have the Alerted Condition without requiring your Focus, even when Unconscious or Sleeping.

options.name: Oracle Guidance
options.description: The Gnollish culture is guided by mysterious oracles, and interpreting signs is an important facet of life. Gain +1 Insight and 1 Luck Dice.

options.name: Trained Hunters
options.description: Becoming a hunter is something nearly all are expected do within Gnollish society as a right of passage. Gain +1 Stealth, +1 Initiative and +1 Insight.

options.name: Path of the Shaman
options.description: Many within the Gnollish culture rely on shamanism for healing. Gain +1 Alchemy, +1 Medicine, and Learn 2 Beginner and 2 Novice Druidic Spells.

options.name: Pack Fighter
options.description: The Gnollish culture is based on moving in large packs and hunting together. Once per turn, you can add a 1d4 Bonus to an Attack Roll when at least 2 Allies are within 4 Units of you.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Mark of the Hunt
options.description: You Mark a target you can see within 30 Units lasting until the end of a Full Rest. You gain +2 Movement Speed towards your target and deal an extra 1d10 Damage whenever you deal Physical Damage to them.
